name: Feng Yang
story: Weimin Shi grew up in a small village in rural China. Despite his young age, he was always fascinated by technology and explosives. He joined the Chinese military as soon as he turned 18, hoping to put his skills to use. He quickly proved himself as a skilled Recon Demo Specialist, often impressing his superiors with his ability to improvise and adapt to any situation. Despite his quiet and reserved nature, he is fiercely loyal to his comrades and will do whatever it takes to complete his mission.
